title: Ep 169: China’s Economy To Surge This Year
itunes:title: China’s Economy To Surge This Year
description: Matt Badiali, the Analyst of the S&A Resource Report newsletter, highlights leading indicators which suggest China's economy is about to boom. Matt also talks about the junior gold mining sector. He believes several stocks in this depressed sector offer huge returns over the next 12-18 months.
